body_html:
Thanks for the review @gunan. I've fixed the lines you spotted, but haven't figured out yet how to lint the TF code so hopefully it'll pass now:

I tried:

bazel test -c opt --copt="-march=native" --config=cuda //tensorflow/python:basic_session_run_hooks_test

and:

PYLINTRC=./tensorflow/tools/ci_build/pylintrc pylint tensorflow/python/training/basic_session_run_hooks_test.py

body:
Thanks for the review @gunan. I've fixed the lines you spotted, but haven't figured out yet how to lint the TF code so hopefully it'll pass now:

I tried:

    bazel test -c opt --copt="-march=native" --config=cuda //tensorflow/python:basic_session_run_hooks_test

and:

    PYLINTRC=./tensorflow/tools/ci_build/pylintrc pylint tensorflow/python/training/basic_session_run_hooks_test.py
